metadata.title: Atmospheric CO2/C13 data from various Canadian locations, 1974-present
metadata.description: Atmospheric carbon dioxide measurements from Alert, NWT (1974- 2000 ,continuing), Sable Island (1974-1981), Cape St. James (1974-1981), Kains Island (1978-1984)and Quatsino Light Station (1981-1984). Also from ships of opportunity travelling between Canada and Japan (Canadian Ace, Canada Maru, Skaugran) and Canada and Australia (Lillooet) and oceanographic cruises.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Monitoring long term changes of atmospheric carbon dioxide; 13C:12C ratios .

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Custodian will be leaving soon and has a large quantity of data not secured in a regional data centre.
Risk of Loss: High
Impact Justification: Long term time series (more than 10 years), large volume of high quality data
Impact of Loss: High
Recommended Action: Obtain access to the data and bring data to archives.

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Some data not yet prepared for publication, not qualilty checked. AES own some Alert/Sable Island data.

Distribution liability: [unknown]

Native data set environment: Expected Growth Rate: Null

Data quality - Logical consistency: Interlaboratory comparisons, calibration of instrumentation with known standards.
Data quality - Completeness: Dataset Complications: Before 1988, analyses were done on an infrared spectrometer; after 1988 they were done on a mass spectrometer.
Lineage - Process steps:
  1. DFO and AES collaborative data.

Distribution liability: [unknown]
